id.description: The unique identifier for the campaign.

createdAt.description: The date and time when the campaign was created.

updatedAt.description: The date and time when the campaign was last updated.

active.description: Indicates whether the campaign is currently active or not.

description.description: A brief description of the campaign.

programId.description: The unique identifier of the program to which the campaign belongs.

programName.description: The name of the program to which the campaign belongs.

type.description: The type of the campaign (e.g., email, social media, event).

workspaceName.description: The name of the workspace where the campaign is stored.
